mapper.select: SELECT AUTH_DEPT_ID AS DEPT_ID FROM SSYS252T WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, HGRK_DEPT_ID, DEPT_SORT_SEQC, DEPT_LVL_CD, HDDP_EMP_ID, ORG_DST_CD, SELL_OCR_YN, ORG_CRT_DATE, ORG_CLOSE_DATE, CHG_EMP_ID, CHG_DT FROM HMST100T START WITH HGRK_DEPT_ID = #{deptId} CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = HGRK_DEPT_ID UNION ALL SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, HGRK_DEPT_ID, DEPT_SORT_SEQC, DEPT_LVL_CD, HDDP_EMP_ID, ORG_DST_CD, SELL_OCR_YN, ORG_CRT_DATE, ORG_CLOSE_DATE, CHG_EMP_ID, CHG_DT FROM HMST100T WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
